2W0121








[solution]		 _____ 2W0122








[solution]      [Next]
2W0123








[solution]		 _____ 2W0124








[solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0121
    • 1. Bd4 threatens the queen and 2.
    • Qxg7 mate.

    		_____
  • 2W0122
    • The fastest is 1. Qd5+ Ke7 2.
    • Qxe5 mate!!

  • 2W0123
    • 1. Qxf7+ Kd8 2. Qf6+ forks the
    • king and rook

    		_____
  • 2W0124
    • 1. Ba5 Qxa5 2. Nb7+ forks the king
    • and queen

    2W0125








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0126








    [solution]      [Next]
    2W0127








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0128








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0125
    • 1. Rc8+ Rd8 2. either rook takes
    • d8 and mate

    		_____
  • 2W0126
    • 1. Ra7+ mates with the other rook
    • on move 2.

  • 2W0127
    • 1. Bxe6 Kxe6 2. Nc7+ forks the
    • king and rook.

    		_____
  • 2W0128
    • the simple way is 1. Qg5+ and then
    • 2. Qg4 mate

    2W0129








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0130








    [solution]      [Next]
    2W0131








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0132








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0129
    • 1. Bc4+ Kh7 2. Nf8+ forks the king
    • and bishop.

    		_____
  • 2W0130
    • 1. Rd6+ Kd7 2. Rxc6+ or 1. ...
    • Kf7 2. Rxd7+

  • 2W0131
    • 1. Qa6+ Qb7 2. Nd6+ forking the
    • king and Queen.

    		_____
  • 2W0132
    • 1. Qe8+ Bf8 2. Nf7+ forking the
    • king and queen.

    2W0133








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0134








    [solution]      [Next]
    2W0135








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0136








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0133
    • 1. Bf5+ wins the rook or allows Kb8
    • 2. Rxd8 mate

    		_____
  • 2W0134
    • 1. Qxe8+!! and 2. h8=Q+ wins a
    • knight for a pawn

  • 2W0135
    • Both 1. Qxd7 an 1. Rxe8+ win
    • material on move 2.

    		_____
  • 2W0136
    • 1. Re8+ Kb7 2. Rd7 mate Rd8+
    • first also works

    2W0137








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0138








    [solution]      [Next]
    2W0139








    [solution]    		 _____ 2W0140








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 2W0137
    • 1. Nxd6+ Kd8 2. Nxf7+ forking the
    • king and rook.

    		_____
  • 2W0138
    • 1. Rb8+ and now 2. Qe8 Rxe8+ or 2.
    • Ne8 Qh8 mate.

  • 2W0139
    • 1. h4+ Kh5 2. Nf6 mate or Ng3
    • mate or Ng7 mate!

    		_____
  • 2W0140
    • 1. d5! Ne5 2. Qa4+ forks the king
    • and the knight
